content: doll shoes crochet pattern by amy s gurumis © amy s gurumis all rights reserved this pattern may not be copied reproduced distributed or resold in any form finished items made from this pattern may be sold provided design credit is clearly given to amy s gurumis supplies tools yarn 3 25 mm crochet hook light worsted knit picks dishie stitch marker yarn needle materials scissors 2 white buttons notes info crochet terms us pattern is worked in continuous rounds abbreviations r = round single_crochet = single_crochet chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet repeat = repeat increase = increase crochet twice in one stitch st s = stitch es decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together slip_stitch = slip_stitch examples single_crochet all around = means single_crochet once in each st of the round single_crochet 10 = means single_crochet once in each of the following 10 sts double_crochet 10 = means double_crochet once in each of the following 10 sts single_crochet 1 increase 1 = means single_crochet once in the next st single_crochet twice in the next st double_crochet 1 increase 1 = means double_crochet once in the next st double_crochet twice in the next st pattern chain 8 r1 3 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 5 3 single_crochet in the next chain single_crochet 5 down the opposite side of the chain 16 r2 increase 1 repeat 3 times single_crochet 5 increase 1 repeat 3 times single_crochet 5 22 r3 single_crochet 1 increase 1 repeat 3 times single_crochet 5 single_crochet 1 increase 1 repeat 3 times single_crochet 5 28 r4 single_crochet 2 increase 1 repeat 3 times single_crochet 5 single_crochet 2 increase 1 repeat 3 times single_crochet 5 34 r5 in back loops only single_crochet 2 double_crochet 10 single_crochet 22 34 r6 single_crochet 2 decrease 1 repeat 5 times single_crochet 22 29 r7 single_crochet all around 29 r8 slip_stitch all around 29 to make strap r9 chain 5 and skip 10 single_crochet slip_stitch 1 to join fasten_off and use the tail to sew a button to the strap have a question about this pattern don t hesitate to email me amysgurumis@gmail com
